summary: This module contains unit tests that validate the behavior of the OIDC authentication client within the Feast permissions SDK. It checks that HTTP request sessions are properly wrapped with OIDC tokens, that the client manager retrieves and refreshes tokens as expected, and that various authentication configurations are handled correctly using mock objects.
business_intent: Guarantee that OIDC-based authentication works reliably for Feast permission services, ensuring secure token handling and correct session configuration for downstream API calls.
